description:
Divorces

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
12631 Statistics of final judgments in matrimonial matters

Definition:
Divorce means the dissolution of a marriage by judicial
decision.
The statistics cover all divorces in the population (Germans
and foreigners). Cases in which German courts pronounce
divorces based upon foreign law are also included.
However, cases in which both spouses are members of foreign
armed forces stationed in the territory of the Federal
Republic of Germany are not taken into account.
